demolition

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bomb, Character, Explosion

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is used to store and handle functions common to all entities.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int animationState
      The frame in the animation cycle it's currently on.
      protected processing.core.PImage currentFrame
      The current frame to be drawn to the screen.
      protected java.util.List<processing.core.PImage> frames
      A List of all frames in the entity's animation cycle.
      int gameTime
      The number of ticks since the entity was created.
      int x
      The current entity's coordinates.
      int y
      The current entity's coordinates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Coordinates draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
      Draws the entity's current frame at its current position to the game.
      void setFrames(java.util.List<processing.core.PImage> frames)
      Sets the entity's frames to a new List of frames.
      abstract void tick()
      Updates the entity by one tick (1/60 of a second) and handles relevant internal events.
      void updateFrame()
      Changes the current frame to the next one in the entity's animation cycle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(java.util.List<processing.core.PImage> frames)
        Creates a new entity.
        Parameters:
        frames - The animation frames used by the entity.

      • Entity

        public Entity(java.util.List<processing.core.PImage> frames,
              int startX,
              int startY)
        Creates a new entity. This constructor is used when the coordinates are known at time of initialisation.
        Parameters:
        frames - The animation frames used by the entity.
        startX - The entity's initial x-coord.
        startY - The entity's initial y-coord.

      • Entity

        public Entity(processing.core.PImage image,
              int x,
              int y)
        Creates a new entity. This constructor is used when the entity is not animated.
        Parameters:
        image - The animation's static image.
        x - The entity's x-coord.
        y - The entity's y-coord.

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public abstract void tick()
        Updates the entity by one tick (1/60 of a second) and handles relevant internal events.

      • draw

        public Coordinates draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws the entity's current frame at its current position to the game.
        Parameters:
        app - The app.
        Returns:
        The coordinates at which the entity is drawn.

      • updateFrame

        public void updateFrame()
        Changes the current frame to the next one in the entity's animation cycle.

      • setFrames

        public void setFrames(java.util.List<processing.core.PImage> frames)
        Sets the entity's frames to a new List of frames.
        Parameters:
        frames - The new List of frames assigned to the entity.
